pullrequest.title: Added the first version of the Inertia tutorial.

content.raw: Unfortunately, nifti_robot_description is a part of software that has not yet been released. So what do you suggest to do? Is it okay to just state that it is any package containing the robot model, or should we rather put something like `my_robot_package` there?
content.html: Unfortunately, nifti_robot_description is a part of software that has not yet been released. So what do you suggest to do? Is it okay to just state that it is any package containing the robot model, or should we rather put something like my_robot_package there?
